isis.stitle: INTERNATIONAL 4X2 AND 6X4 SPRING SUSPENSION WITH TORQUE RODS - SERVICE - LEAF SPRING - DISASSEMBLY/ ASSEMBLY

step1.para: Position spring assembly in vise such that assembly will be clamped near center.
Remove rebound clip nuts, bolts and spacer.
Remove nut from spring assembly center bolt.
Release vise to permit spring leaves to separate. Remove spring assembly from vise and separate spring leaves. Remove center bolt.
Replace cracked, broken or defective spring components.
With spring leaves in proper position and location, insert a drift punch long enough to go through all the leaf center bolt holes.

Place spring assembly in vise and align all center bolt holes. Compress spring leaves sufficiently for installation of center bolt and nut. Remove drift punch and install center bolt/nut. Always use new center bolt.
Compress spring leaves fully. Torque center bolt/nut to specified torque. Refer to TORQUE CHART. Cut off excess length of center bolt so that bolt is flush with top of nut.
Align spring leaves by tapping with hammer and position rebound clips on spring. Install spacers, bolts and nuts. Tighten enough to hold leaves in alignment, but not enough to restrict free movement.
